greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{p is odd and prime and divisor of n} (p - 2).
comment: Denominator of c_n = Product_{odd p| n} (p-1)/(p-2). Numerator is A173557. [Yamasaki and Yamasaki]. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 19 2020
link: Markus Sigg, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Yamasaki, Yasuo, and Aiichi Yamasaki, On the Gap Distribution of Prime Numbers, Kyoto University Research Information Repository, October 1994. MR1370273 (97a:11141).
maple: A305444 := proc(n) mul(d - 2, d = numtheory[factorset](n) minus {2}) end proc:
results.author: _Markus Sigg_, Aug 12 2018
